VII.iii.1.A.1.g
.
Apportionments as a Convenience on the Part of Beneficiaries
VA does not apportion benefits to a dependent as a convenience on the part of a beneficiary.
38 CFR 3.106
prohibits a beneficiary from renouncing a portion of their benefits so that VA may allocate them to another person.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A - Apportionment Process
citation: Part VII, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A
